name: Cycling
benefits: Cycling can help to protect you from serious diseases such as stroke, heart attack, some cancers, depression, diabetes, obesity and arthritis.

name: Motor bike
benefits: Motorcycling is the act of riding a motorcycle. For some people, motorcycling may be the only affordable form of individual motorized transportation, and small-displacement.

name: UniCycling
benefits: The simple explanation is that riding a unicycle is difficult and unnatural. The steps required to learn how to ride one are not obvious and pose obstacles that, for most, are prohibitive.

name: Elephant Ride
